entries.title: Help URL
entries.description: URL to the manual. If empty, it links to the latest manual from BEXIS2

entries.title: Check public metadata for not-logged in users
entries.description: Set true to enable to show metadata for not-logged in users, if the dataset is not public.

entries.title: Reduce versions select for logged in users
entries.description: Set true to reduce the versions select for logged in users.

entries.title: Restrict to latest version for logged in users
entries.description: Set true to restrict the version select to the latest version for logged in users.

entries.title: Activate tags to summarize versions
entries.description: Enable to possibilty for Users to define a combination of versions to a tag.

entries.title: Use minor tags
entries.description: Activate minor tags in order to be able to show the changes more granularly.
